hero.name: Bulşah Keçici
hero.title: Data Scientist & Computer Engineer
hero.subtitle: Building intelligent systems and data-driven solutions

about.title: About Me
about.bio:
I'm Bulşah Keçici, based in Ankara, and I genuinely enjoy building things at the intersection of data science and software engineering. For over nine years, I've been working on AI-driven systems, and what keeps me excited is seeing complex data turn into something that actually helps people—something practical, usable, and meaningful in real life. When I face a new challenge, I like to slow down first: understand what the problem really is, where the data comes from, what's missing or misleading, and what decision someone is trying to make. Once the picture is clear, I build the solution step by step.

My work often revolves around machine learning, computer vision, and intelligent automation. I don't enjoy stopping at "a model that works on my machine." I care about whether the system can be trusted, measured, maintained, and improved over time. That's why I naturally take ownership of the full journey—from data pipelines and feature building to model training, deployment, monitoring, and iteration. My statistical background helps me stay grounded and avoid shortcuts, while my engineering mindset helps me turn ideas into systems people can rely on.

I work mostly with Python and SQL, and I'm comfortable using Docker, Kubernetes, and Git as part of everyday delivery. But for me, technology is never the goal—it's the tool that helps bring a thoughtful solution to life. I value collaboration, honest communication, and learning from others, and I enjoy working with teams where curiosity and responsibility go together. I'm especially motivated by opportunities that involve cross-border teamwork. That's why I'm open to roles across Germany and Europe, where I can help build intelligent systems that make data-driven decisions feel more human, more practical, and more impactful.

highlights.title: Career Highlights
items: For 9+ years, I've led data science work end-to-end—from problem framing to production deployment and monitoring.
I deliver measurable AI and automation systems that directly improve real decision-making workflows.
I build high-performing models validated with the right metrics and proven reliable in real-world use.
In computer vision, I combine detection, tracking, and classification with real-time pipelines and automation.
I build data pipelines with Python and SQL, and make deployment and operations sustainable with Docker, Kubernetes, and Git.
I turn data science outputs into usable web/desktop products through full-stack implementation.
I designed multi-layer healthcare management systems covering role-based access, scheduling, treatment planning, finance, and reporting.

about.availability: Open to relocation and collaboration in Germany and across Europe

items.name: VehicleSpeedDetection
items.desc: An AI-powered system using YOLOv8 to detect speeding vehicles, recognize license plates, and calculate dynamic fines based on insurance values.
items.result: Achieved 95% accuracy and integrated automated database reporting.

items.name: BulkaDental Management System
items.desc: A comprehensive multi-platform dental clinic management system with treatment planning, role-based dashboards, and discount automation.
items.result: Deployed for real clinical use with modular scalability for web and mobile platforms.

items.name: OpenTicket System
items.desc: A complete ticket management system with admin panel, event CRUD operations, and QR-based e-tickets built with ASP.NET Web Forms.
items.result: Implemented comprehensive event management with QR code generation and ticket validation.

items.name: Multi-Platform Dental App
items.desc: A cross-platform dental application supporting multiple platforms with unified patient management and treatment tracking.
items.result: Created scalable solution supporting web, mobile, and desktop platforms.

items.name: Web Survey Project
items.desc: A comprehensive web-based survey system with data collection, analysis, and reporting capabilities.
items.result: Built responsive survey platform with real-time data collection and analytics.

items.title: Building AI-Powered Vehicle Speed Detection with YOLOv8
items.excerpt: A comprehensive guide to implementing real-time vehicle speed detection using YOLOv8, OpenCV, and PostgreSQL. Learn how to achieve 95% accuracy in traffic monitoring systems.

items.title: Multi-Platform Healthcare Management: From WPF to Flutter
items.excerpt: Exploring the challenges and solutions in building cross-platform healthcare management systems. A deep dive into modular architecture and role-based dashboards.

items.title: Event Management Systems: QR Codes and Digital Ticketing
items.excerpt: Building comprehensive event management platforms with ASP.NET Web Forms. Learn about QR code generation, ticket validation, and automated event operations.

items.title: Cross-Platform Development: Lessons from Dental App Architecture

items.title: Web Survey Systems: Data Collection and Analytics
items.excerpt: Building responsive survey platforms with real-time data collection and analytics. A practical approach to web-based research tools.
